SELECT T.receipt_mail_seq, T.send_email_seq, T.email_subject, T.name, T.job_name, T.send_time , T.receipt_favorites, T.email_receipt_read_count, T.receipt_important FROM ( SELECT rownum AS RNO , V.receipt_mail_seq, V.send_email_seq, V.email_subject, V.name, V.job_name, V.send_time , V.receipt_favorites, V.email_receipt_read_count, V.receipt_important FROM ( SELECT r.receipt_mail_seq, e.send_email_seq, e.email_subject, p.name, j.job_name, to_char(e.send_time, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi') as send_time , r.receipt_favorites, r.email_receipt_read_count, r.receipt_important FROM tbl_receipt_email r JOIN tbl_email e ON r.fk_send_email_seq = e.send_email_seq JOIN tbl_employees p ON p.email = e.fk_sender_email JOIN tbl_jobs j ON j.job_id = p.fk_job_id WHERE (r.fk_recipient_email = #{email} OR r.fk_reference_email = #{email} OR r.fk_hidden_reference_email = #{email}) AND r.receipt_delete = 0
AND lower(e.email_subject) LIKE '%' || lower(#{searchWord}) || '%'
AND lower(e.email_contents) LIKE '%' || lower(#{searchWord}) || '%'
AND (lower(e.email_subject) LIKE '%' || lower(#{searchWord}) || '%' OR lower(content) LIKE '%' || lower(#{searchWord}) || '%')
AND lower(p.name) LIKE '%' || lower(#{searchWord}) || '%'
AND lower(j.job_name) LIKE '%' || lower(#{searchWord}) || '%'
order by r.fk_send_email_seq desc ) V ) T WHERE RNO BETWEEN #{startRno} AND #{endRno}

select distinct j.job_name

and lower(e.email_subject) like '%'||lower(#{searchWord})||'%'
